snippet.title: FIA European Truck Racing Championship | Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Jump into the cab in the middle of an FIA ETRC race where 5-tonne trucks go head to head in four 45km races. 

This simulation pushes the limits of what's possible, designed to captures the thrills of handling these monstrous machines. 

FIA ETRC will be available on July 18 on PlayStation®4, Xbox One, PC and Nintendo Switch™!
-------------------------------
